name: Recursion VR Demo
description:
This is an APK download for Oculus/Meta Quest. There's a PC VR version for Rift/Index/Vive for Windows over 

You can learn more about the game it's ongoing development on our website over at https://www.recursionvr.com.

Recursion VR is a retro-synthwave style fantasy RPG with a focus on hack 'n slash gameplay. You take on the role of the worlds most advanced cyborg human-AI symbiosis as you're being hunted by something far more powerful. The Singularity has left the world changed forever as AIs are involved in every aspect of life, including warfare. The Internet has become extremely volatile and combative, only the most experienced and sharp Shepherds are capable of surviving as Netrunners. Now you can take up arms in an immersive new world full of evils to overcome as you explore the intricacies of Cyberspace.
